documents.title: we out !
text: and¦ that 's it .
we 're off to imagine a new world where gifs , selfies and the internet does n't exist .
our colleague huw oliver will be on deck tomorrow to navigate the choppy cultural waters .
we 'll leave you with this , obama singing fancy :

documents.title: what 's going on wednesday ?
text: natasia demetriou : best starer since barry davies and big train @ twitterid.com noelmc.com > craving culture ?
stuck for something to do in the mid-week wasteland .
fear not , we 've got a couple of ideas from high-brow to gutter sniping .
the ring cycle plays - london the scoop is hosting free theatre again this year and after the thebans last year , they 've decided to go in with an abridged version of wagner 's ring cycle .
you do n't need to book , just turn up .

the scoop , se1 , wed to 31 aug edinburgh comedy if your up in scotland there 's a smorgasbord of lols to be had , from quint fontana 's coogan-esque japes to dane baptiste and his plain-talking routine .
why not try something new though , with natasia demetriou 's post-gervais jokeless shtick ?

underbelly , 9.20pm , to 24 aug dinosaur jr , converge - london j mascis and lou barlow are back in the capital , playing the impressive brooklyn bowl , as are converge who will turn your hair white with their aggressive metalcore .
brace thyself !

brooklyn bowl , se10 & scala , n1 stay in and watch some biblical business if you do n't fancy going out you could have a gander at noah , which our home entertainment expert , charlie lyne reviewed this week .
teenage sexual frustration and attempted infanticide is the order of the day , and things get very wet¦ paramount , dvd & blu-ray

text: this just in from the guardian 's it wizard ben mcleavys , whose got involved with the expendables 3 fun we started yesterday .
mozza , byrne and mark e smith all posse up for one last mission¦

documents.title: got a spare minute ( or seven ) ? watch this terrence malick-style music video
text: made by the amazingly named , thailand-based filmmaker , champ ensminger , the video for avant-guitar guys steve gunn and mike cooper 's pony blues is n't your average arty vid .
clocking in at seven minutes long , it 's a retelling of a thai ghost story that 's vivid and a little bit creepy .
champ gives us the skinny below : in thailand 's northern countryside , a ghost story is told to warn young people and travelers from wandering into the jungle .
many years ago , a lonely stable boy in charge of the king 's horses went hungry , and was forced into eating one of his horses .
he became sick , and died in the jungle at the edge of a river .
since then , a spirit has been told to walk near the edge of the woods , taking the form of a human ( man or woman ) with the features of a horse .
as revenge for his loneliness , the spirit of the stable boy lures young lost travelers into the jungle , where they meet a watery grave .
enjoy !

documents.title: `` just a tasty little morsel like a cherry tomato . '' the big ups give us their top 5 fruit-based tracks
text: big ups : love grapes and pet rocks .
yoon the big ups released one of our favourite records back in january .
eighteen hours of static was part black flag angst , part crass-like social commentary and part ace , aggressive but intelligent indie rock .

they 're playing at jabberwocky next weekend and ahead of that they were courteous enough to give us their top five fruit-based tracks ( we did n't actual ask for that but they were so funny we though we 'd just go with it ) .
in case you missed it , moon duo ( psych ) and oozing wound ( thrash ) also gave us their respective top 5s recently .
oh , and in case you 're thinking a tomato is a vegetable , it is n't - at least , not on this live blog .
palehound - pet carrot this song is great .
i remember when i was really young , i had a pet rock , and i imagine that caring for a pet carrot is much like nurturing a pet rock .
anyways , pet carrot - just wait for the bass to drop .
best indie rock bass drop of 2013 .
lvl up - nightshade so this one fits the theme a little more loosely , but tomatoes , eggplants ( ed - aubergines ) , peppers , etc .
are all nightshades .
anyways , this is a quick little jammer from lvl up from their first lp , space brothers .
what a melancholy song .
it starts just as it begins .
just a tasty little morsel- like a cherry tomato .
ovlov - grapes alright , ovlov .
have you ever seen these guys ?
this whole record , am , is just cream-of-the-crop .
steve hartlett 's talking about drinking wine in this song - what 's not to like ?
grapes and guitars : i think we 're on to something here¦ 2 .
amanda x - parsnips wow .
amanda x from philadelphia .
we 've played a few shows with amanda x , and they 're just so damn good .
amnesia is constantly on repeat in my apartment .

and this song in particular is so good - with the dynamic shifts , the melody¦ not really sure how parsnips fit into the song lyrically , but maybe that 's for amanda x to know , and us to ( never ) find out .
pile - bump a grape alright , so we got another song about grapes .
i told you that grapes & guitars were a good combination .
but you did n't believe me .
anyways , this song is just a modern classic .
when pile plays this song live to a familiar crowd , the whole room just starts shouting the lyrics and it 's kind of this great communal moment .
along with lyrics like spiders in my butt ' and i want a string quartet while i use the loo ' , this song is like a clove of garlic - tasty , and sticks to your fingers after ingesting .

documents.title: step into shangaan
text: nozinja : simon cowell with feathers warp lanre here , taking over from gwilym with a self-indulgent recollection followed by a mix you might like ( so stick with it ) .
i was lucky enough to be sent to south africa a while back to hang out with nozinja , the main man behind the shangaan electro scene/sound .

he was an incredible bloke as i described at the time : this is shangaan electro , and nozinja is the 44-year-old self-styled kingpin of a scene that he has taken from township backstreets to countries as far-flung as finland and australia .
he 's a larger-than-life character : just over six-foot tall , rotund , affable and with a wardrobe of brightly coloured pinstripe shirts , tailored trousers and the shiniest of dress shoes .
shangaan story chris saunders for the guide which is great , but does n't really tell you anything about the music .

traditional shangaan music is a mix of fluid guitar lines and live drumming made popular by artists such as thomas chauke and one-time paul simon collaborator general md shirinda , who appeared on 1986 's graceland .
it took a couple of albums before nozinja 's own harder , faster , electronicised version of the sound some of his tracks are a breakneck 190 bpm was accepted .
while i was over there i saw nozinja putting together a mix for rinse on his home pc in a sound-proofed shed in his back yard , while his dog tried to bite me .
it was ace .
he 's done another mix - this time for just jam - all performed from his acer laptop .
strap yourself in and forget your computer snobbery for two minutes .

documents.title: james : corden bleu or corden bleugh
text: it looks like james corden , mirthmaker and enemy of patrick stewart , is set for a move to us late night tv , taking the late late show soon to be vacated by craig ferguson .
to commemorate this momentous maybe-news , we 're after your best 140-character definitions of james corden .
we 're off to a flyer with the first one : josie rae turnbull ( @ josieraet ) @ guideguardian a shrill bread roll so anyway , send us your definitions .
the best ones will appear on here .
technically 125 when factoring in the guardian guide twitter handle , pedantry fans

documents.title: bat 's entertainment : channel 5 win rights to gotham
text: news of a bit of a acquisitions coup for channel 5 , who have snared the fox 's batman prequel gotham .

here 's a nice long trailer to get you suitably acquainted : on the surface , this looks like it might be more of the dimly lit antihero fare that we had a right old whinge about in the guide a few months back .
that said , early reviews of the pilot have been largely encouraging .
so , what do you reckon ?
essential telly , or the second coming of the cape ?
let us know in the comments

new york edm festival electric zoo has taken the unusual step of forcing ticket-buyers to watch an anti-drugs film before completing their transaction , in the hope of reducing drugs use at the event .
very noble and all , but there 's one fatal flaw : the video is laughably bad .

as such , it joins the long list of endearingly rubbish attempts in pop culture to deter people from getting off their mash : reefer madness think the early 20th century was just vera lynn songs and stiff upper lips ?
think again daddyo .
in response to all this depravity came reefer madness , a 1938 morality tale which features manslaughter , suicide , attempted sexual assault and people laughing hysterically at pianos .
kevin takes lsd on grange hill they 're fake tattoos , you wet them and then you stick them on your arm .
thus begins a terrifying journey into the outer reaches of sanity .
thank god francesca martinez was on hand to sort things out .
this is your brain on drugs any questions ?
yes : if the egg represents your brain , and the frying pan is drugs , what does that make the man holding the pan ?
and what about the hob ?
and the kitchen ?
let 's go through it one more time the horrors of cake as bruno brookes says , we all like to party .
but side-effects of forcing this dangerous dimesmeric anderson phosphate down your mush include vomiting up your own pelvis bone and thinking you have a calendar month to cross the street .
on the flip side , sometimes anti-drugs messages are chillingly effective .
these adverts from the montana meth project are horrifying enough to make you swear off breaking bad meth cupcakes for life , let alone the actual stuff .
and then there 's the undoubted king of pop cultural drugs deterrents , requiem of a dream , described at the time by peter bradshaw as like a gruesome yet compelling vivisectional experiment .
i 'm too scared to search for that notorious final scene on youtube , so here 's the trailer instead .
stay safe kids .

documents.title: it 's the end of the world , and nic cage knows it
text: now that 's he 's got his customary one competent film of the calendar year ' out of the way , nic cage can get back to the schlocky nonsense that is his stock in trade .
next up is left behind , a remake of the video of the eponymous slipknot song , with cage playing the role of the clown .
sorry , that last bit was a lie .
it 's a remake of the dreadful christian disaster film with kirk cameron .
here 's the first full trailer , which features cage in full gurn-face mode and endless lakes of fire : watch the trailer here

bulletin.text: More thrilling than a Salmond/Darling face-off, was the Guide Daily.
Imagine if Face Off had actually starred Alex Salmond and Alistair Darling! How good would that have been?
Anyway, all the usual pop culture content' you'll ever want or need, plus the rapture (the apocalyptic event, not the band)
